summary: When Air Force One goes down over the Bermuda Triangle, the Navy sends its best rescue team. But in saving the president, the team awakens a monster which threatens America's entire Eastern Seaboard and, ultimately, the world.
cast: Trevor Donovan|Linda Hamilton|Mya|John Savage|Jamie Kennedy|Jair Burgos|Richard Whiten|Ricco Ross|Jeff Rector|Robert Blanche|Angelique Cinelu|Justin Cuomo|Luke White|Stephanie Cantu|Darren Anthony Thomas|Craig Blair|Andy Clemence|Howard Dell|Tiffany Pulvino|Regi Davis|Jonathan Kowalski|Joe Sabatino|Graham Clarke|Marcus Shirock|Blanca Blanco|Natalie Burtney|Dan Coyle|Adrian Quinonez|Antonio Reed|Carlos Ayala|Steve Troublesome Castillo|HenRii Coleman|Patrice Gibbs|Joe Rudy Guerrero Jr.|William McCarthy|Johnny Meyer|Christian O'Brien|Jeremey Penn|Joseph Tony Stewart|Jose Rosete
